title: US Judge says Google can keep Chrome, but 'exclusive deals' are a no-go
description: U.S. District Judge Amit Mehta's ruling delivers a ruling that has evolved due to the inclusion of "general artificial intelligence."
content:
What you need to know
Today (Sep 2), U.S. Judge Amit Mehta's ruling says that Google will not have to divest Chrome or Android in its antitrust case regarding its online search monopoly.

title: The connected customer

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Historic Partnership Elevates Assamese Language in AI Database
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact.
